pacman.viewer

Class AgentItemPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • pacman.viewer.AgentItemPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class AgentItemPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Contains a component that can let user choose which character to controll when the game starts.
    Version:
    1.0
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • addComboBoxActionListener

        public void addComboBoxActionListener(java.awt.event.ActionListener l)
        Adds an ActionListener to the algorithm checkbox..

        The ActionListener will receive an ActionEvent when a selection has been made. If the combo box is editable, then an ActionEvent will be fired when editing has stopped.

        Parameters:
        l - the ActionListener that is to be notified
